column4: hi guys. i bought a usb microphone port for my laptop. comments on newegg said it was ubuntu-friendly. nothing happens when i plug it in. can anyone help?
here is the output of dmesg|tail after i unplug then replug the usb device: http://pastebin.com/ARWq6JDB
only the last 5 lines are relevant. the first 5 are from doing the same thing a few seconds earlier.
so have you tried using it?
well yes, i open System > Preferences > Sound and it doesn't appear as a device.
